name: company_name
label: Company Name
description: The company name that will appear on your cart pages. If blank, the 'Doing Business As' name in your account settings will be used.

name: use_square_images
label: Use Square Product Images?
description: Indicates if you would like to use square product images, resulting in consistent size of all images. Otherwise, the default shape of the product images will be used.

name: page_title
label: Page Title
description: The page title that will be displayed by the browser.

name: form_label_position
label: Form Label Position
description: Determines where form labels appear for an input. Top places the label on top of the input. Inside sets the label as a placeholder inside the input.

name: footer_text
label: Footer Text
description: Text that you would like to include within the default footer. Allows basic HTML tags (formatting, links, etc.).

name: error_notifications
label: Error Notifications Behavior
description: The behavior of inline validation when a user tabs through form fields (before a form is submitted). Mild turns off error notifications when the user leaves a field, moderate highlights the field with the error color and aggressive highlights the field with the error color and shows the error block text. On form submission, all invalid fields are highlighted with the error color and the error block text is displayed.

name: show_promo_code
label: Show Promo Code
description: Do you want to provide an option for a user to supply a promotion / discount code? If you don't use promo codes, it is recommended to not display this field.

name: promo_code_name
label: Promo Code Name
description: The name you use to refer to promo codes, i.e. Discount Code, Coupon Code, etc.

name: hide_quantity
label: Hide Quantity Selection
description: Enable if you don't want users to be able to manually change the quantity of items in their cart.

name: exp_select
label: Expiration Date Dropdown
description: Indicates if you want to display expiration dates as a dropdown. If false, expiration date fields will be supplied as free-form text entry.

name: ask_save_cards
label: Ask to Save Cards
description: Indicates if customers can select to save their credit card to their account for future purchases. If enabled, it is recommended that you turn on the optional field 'Credentials' (under Settings > Payment) so customers have the option to create a username and password after they complete an order. This setting only applies if your account is configured to allow saving cards. Orders that contain subscriptions will not display this field as those orders always save the card for future rebills.

name: show_digital_delivery
label: Show Digital Delivery
description: For items that are fulfilled digitally, this indicates if you want to present delivery items (such as file download links or license codes) on the receipt page. If not, they will be provided in the email confirmation only.

name: enable_languages
label: Enable Languages
description: Allows users to select from different languages during the checkout process.

name: show_continue_shopping
label: Show 'Continue Shopping' Button
description: Indicates if you want to show a 'Continue Shopping' button on the cart summary.

name: receipt_button_position
label: Receipt Button Position
description: Indicate the position of the receipt button, which can direct the user back to your site upon completion of an order.

options.display: Do not display the receipt button

name: receipt_button_text
label: Receipt Button Text
description: The text to display on the receipt button.

name: receipt_button_text_custom
label: Custom Receipt Button Text
description: If you selected custom text for your receipt button text, enter the text you would like to display.

name: receipt_button_url
label: Receipt Button URL
description: The destination URL when a user clicks the Receipt Button. You can use the following dynamic values in your URL: order, payment. For example, https://example.com?order_id={{order.order_id}}&payment_id={{payment.payment_id}}

name: main_shopping_url
label: Main Shopping URL
description: The page you want to direct users to when they are invited to 'Continue Shopping'. Also used to direct users who arrive with invalid cart or session values (such as an expired shopping session or cart).

name: not_found_url
label: Not Found (404) Redirect URL
description: The page you want to direct users to when an invalid website address is supplied. If not provided, the Main Shopping URL will be used.

name: fields
label: Custom Fields
description: An array of custom field definitions (in JSON format) that allow you to place custom fields onto your order form.
